anya-e0807n5:6_3: Tattha yasmiṁ kriyatthe kattuvācimhā kammaṁ gavesīyate,
anya-e0807n5:7_6: Kriyāti ca gamanapacanādiko asattasammato kattari kamme vā patiṭṭhito kārakasamūhasādhiyo padattho vuccati. Api ca –
anya-e0807n5:10_1: pāka+gamanādīhi tesaṁ kriyābhavanānaṁ vāccattaṁ kathaṁ bhavatīti vuttaṁ hoti. Punapi –
anya-e0807n5:14_0: Kāriyarūpā hi dhātvatthā, sattāyuttā ca te+khilā;
anya-e0807n5:15_0: Tato kriyā ca bhāvo ca, sāmaññaṁ tesu gamyate.
anya-e0807n5:16_0: 1. Vattamāneti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe.
anya-e0807n5:17_0: Vattamāne āraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:19_0: Ekānekesu tumhaamhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesu pubbacchakkānaṁ paracchakkānañca
anya-e0807n5:19_9: Evaṁ sesesu bhavissatiādīsu sattasu paccayavidhānasuttesupi yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:20_0: Idāni bhūvādīna+maṭṭhagaṇānaṁ bhūvādigaṇesu bhū=sattāya+miti paṭhamadhātuto parā tyādayo yojīyante.
anya-e0807n5:20_1: Tattha ‘‘ekamhi vattabbe ekavacanaṁ’’ti tyādīsu parabhūtesu kattu+kamma+bhāvesuyeva kyavikaraṇalavikaraṇā
anya-e0807n5:20_2: hontīti ‘‘kyo bhāvakammesva+parokkhesu māna+nta+tyādīsu’’ ‘‘kattari lo’’ iccādinā tesaṁ vikaraṇānaṁ vidhānā
anya-e0807n5:22_0: Nissāya paccayā honti, ete vikaraṇā siyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:24_0: Ivaṇṇu+vaṇṇantānaṁ kriyattānaṁ e+o honti yathākkamaṁ paccayeti ūsso+kāro.
anya-e0807n5:26_0: Sare pare eona+mayavā honti yathākkamaṁti ossa avādeso.
anya-e0807n5:27_0: Uttattā kattu ākhyāte, tatiyā na ca kattari;
anya-e0807n5:29_0: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṁ bahuttā ‘‘bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanaṁ’’ti anti.
anya-e0807n5:31_0: Vikaraṇānaṁ kvaci lopo hotīti lavikaraṇassa lopo,
anya-e0807n5:33_4: Evaṁ paracchekkepi-bhavate, bhavante. Bhavase, bhavavhe. Bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0807n5:40_11: Paracchakke-pacate, pacante. Pacase, pacavhe. Pace, pacāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:42_1: Paṭhamamajjhimapurisānaṁ dvinnaṁ ekattha pasaṅge majjhimapurisabahuvacanaṁ thapaccayo.
anya-e0807n5:42_5: Tulyabalavirodhino hi vippaṭisedhā paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ ekattha pasaṅge uttamapurisabahuvacanaṁ hoti,
anya-e0807n5:45_0: Etesaṁ dhātūnaṁ cchaṅa vā hoti nta+māna+tyādīsu. So gāmaṁ gacchati. Anti –
anya-e0807n5:47_0: Garupubbasmā rassā nte+ntīnaṁ re vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:52_6: Paralope gamenti. Gamesi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema.
anya-e0807n5:53_0: Pure adhammo dibbati, purā marāmīti ca taṁsamīpe tabbohārūpacārena vattamānavacanaṁ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n5:61_3: bhavantyeva hi kālantarepi tyādayo bāhulakā ‘‘santesu parigūhāmi’’ ‘‘kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṁ,
anya-e0807n5:62_0: 5,175. Gama vada dānaṁ ghamma vajja dajjā
anya-e0807n5:63_0: Gamādīnaṁ ghammādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:67_0: Vuttattā akammakato kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:69_0: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu māna+nta+tyādīsu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā.
anya-e0807n5:71_0: Ākhyātena avuttattā, kattuto tatiyā na tu;
anya-e0807n5:78_0: Gamito kamme cchaṅa ca īñaāgame ca kate tena gāmo gacchīyati,
anya-e0807n5:81_0: Tathā hi vijjamānassāpi kammāssa avacanicchāyaṁ idaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0807n5:82_0: Satopi na vivakkhā+ssa, asatopi ca sā bhave;
anya-e0807n5:87_0: 2. Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssati ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṁ ssāmhe
anya-e0807n5:88_0: Bhavissati=anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:90_0: Kriyatthā paresaṁ aādīnaṁ īādīnaṁ ssādīnañca byañjanassi+ña hoti vibhāsā.
anya-e0807n5:97_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṁ vimhaye ca gamyamāne ssatyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:97_3: Na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā bhavissati.
anya-e0807n5:97_4: Kathañhi nāma so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṁ kuṭikaṁ karissati.
anya-e0807n5:97_7: santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena viharanti,
anya-e0807n5:97_8: yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni neva dakkhiti,
anya-e0807n5:98_0: 4. Bhūte ī uṁ o ttha iṁ mhā ā ū se vhaṁ a mhe
anya-e0807n5:99_0: Bhūte parisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā īādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:99_1: Bhūtānajjatane upari vakkhamānattā ime īādayo bhūtajjatane.
anya-e0807n5:105_0: Āādo īādo ssādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hotīti dhātuto pubbaṁ aña.
anya-e0807n5:107_0: Eyyāthādīnaṁ oādayo vā honti yathākkamaṁti īssattho,
anya-e0807n5:107_5: ‘‘Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssamhānaṁ vā’’ti īssa rassattaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:109_0: Tiuṁssa iṁsu+aṁsu vā honti. Abhaviṁsu bhaviṁsu, abhavaṁsu bhavaṁsu, abhavuṁ bhavuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:113_0: Ossa si vā hoti. Abhavisi bhavisi, abhavasi bhavasi. Abhavo bhavo.
anya-e0807n5:115_0: Esaṁ uña vā hoti. Īādisambandhīnameva gahaṇaṁ. Abhavuttha bhavuttha.
anya-e0807n5:117_0: Iṁssa ca siña vā hoti mhātthānañca bahulaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:117_10: Siñāgame abhavasimha bhavasimha abhavasimhā bhavasimhā abhavimha bhavimha abhavimhā bhavimhā abhavamha bhavamha abhavamhā bhavamhā.
anya-e0807n5:117_19: assa a+mādese abhavaṁ bhavaṁ abhava bhava,
anya-e0807n5:117_21: Kamme sukhaṁ tayā anubhūyittho anvabhūyattho anubhūyattho anvabhūsi anubhūsī anvabhūyī anubhūyī,
anya-e0807n5:117_22: anvabhūyiṁsu anubhūyiṁsu anvabhūyaṁsu anubhūyaṁsu anvabhūyuṁ anubhūyuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:117_23: Bhāve-tena abhūyittho bhūyittho abhūyattho bhūyattho abhūyi bhūyi abhūyī bhūyī.
anya-e0807n5:117_24: Tena abhūyattha bhūyattha abhūya bhūya abhūyā bhūyā.
anya-e0807n5:118_2: Cavaggapubba- rūpe apaccittho paccittho apaccattho paccattho apacīyi pacīyi apacīyī pacīyī apacci pacci apaccī paccī,
anya-e0807n5:118_3: apacīyiṁsu pacīyiṁsu apaciṁsu paciṁsu apacīyaṁsu pacīyaṁsu apaccaṁsu paccaṁsu apacīyuṁ pacīyuṁ apaccuṁ paccuṁ iccādi kattusamaṁ,
anya-e0807n5:119_0: So gāmaṁ agacchittho gacchittho iccādi purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:121_0: Ḍaṁsassa ca gamissa ca ñchaṅa vā hoti ā+īādīsu.
anya-e0807n5:121_1: Agañchittho gañchittho agañchattho gañchattho agañchi gañchi agañchī gañchī iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:123_0: Āādo īādo ca gamissa ā hoti vā.
anya-e0807n5:123_1: So agā agami gami agamittho gamittho agamattho gamattho.
anya-e0807n5:123_2: Īpaccaye lassākārassa ‘‘himimesva+ssā’’ti ettha ‘‘assā’’ti yogavibhāgā dīghe ‘‘dīghā īssā’’ti īssa siādeso,
anya-e0807n5:123_4: agamiṁsu gamiṁsu agamaṁsu gamaṁsu agamuṁ gamuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:123_11: ‘‘eyyāthā’’dinā tthe so agacchittha gacchittha agañchittha gañchittha agamittha gamittha agama gama agamā gamā.
anya-e0807n5:123_16: ‘‘Eyyāthā’’ dinā a+mādese ahaṁ agamaṁ gamaṁ ajjhagaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:125_0: Māyoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti.
anya-e0807n5:126_0: 5. Anajjatane ā ūo ttha a mhā ttha tthuṁ se vhaṁ iṁ mhase
anya-e0807n5:127_0: Avijjamānajjatane bhūtatthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti vā.
anya-e0807n5:127_1: ‘‘Eyyāthā’’dinā tthe ‘‘ā ī ū mhā’’ iccādinā rasse ca so abhavattha bhavattha abhava bhava abhavā bhavā,
anya-e0807n5:127_2: te abhavu bhavu abhavū bhavū. O,
anya-e0807n5:127_4: abhava bhava abhavi bhavi abhavattha bhavattha abhavattho bhavattho,
anya-e0807n5:128_0: So odanaṁ apacattha pacattha iccādi kattusamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:128_1: Kamme-apacīyattha pacīyattha apaccattha paccattha apacīya pacīya apacīyā pacīyā apacca pacca apaccā paccā.
anya-e0807n5:128_2: Apacīyu pacīyu apacīyū pacīyū apaccu paccu apaccū paccū iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:129_1: Tathā agamattha gamattha iccādipi aghammattha ghammattha iccādipi.
anya-e0807n5:130_0: 6. Parokkhe a u e ttha a mha ttha re ttho vho i mhe
anya-e0807n5:131_0: Apaccakkhe bhūtānajjatane vattamānato kriyatthā aādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:135_0: Dvitte pubbassa ādito+ññassa byañjanassa lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n5:137_0: Aādīsu dvitte pubbassa bhūssa a hoti.
anya-e0807n5:139_0: Dvitte pubbesaṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā honti yathākkamaṁti bakāre so babhūva kira,
anya-e0807n5:141_0: Aādipaccaye dvibhāve anādibyañjanalope pubbassa ‘‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’’ti cavaggajakāre ‘‘byañjane
anya-e0807n5:141_1: dīgharassā’’ti dīghe ca kate so gāmaṁ jagāma kira, jagamu. Jagame,
anya-e0807n5:142_0: Mūḷhavikkhittabyāsattacittena attanāpi kriyā katā abhinibbattikāle+nupaladdhāsamānā phalenā+numīyamānā parokkhāva vatthuto.
anya-e0807n5:143_0: 7. Yyodo vā+tipattiyaṁ ssā ssaṁsu sse ssatha ssaṁ ssamhā ssatha ssiṁsussasessavhessiṁ ssāmhase.
anya-e0807n5:144_2: Ete ca ssādayo sāmatthiyā atītānāgatesveva honti,
anya-e0807n5:144_5: Iñāgame ssāssa vā rasse ca sace so paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṁ alabhissa,
anya-e0807n5:144_6: arahā abhavissa bhavissa abhavissā bhavissā vā,
anya-e0807n5:144_9: ‘‘Eyyāthā’’dinā ssessa vā akāre tvaṁ abhavissa bhavisse.
anya-e0807n5:144_12: Rasse mayaṁ abhavissamha bhavissamha abhavissamhā bhavissamhā.
anya-e0807n5:146_2: Kamme-tena odano apacissa pacissa apacissā pacissā apacīyissa pacīyissa apacīyissā pacīyissā apaccissa paccissa apaccissā paccissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:147_0: So agacchissa gacchissa agacchissā gacchissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:147_1: Cchādesā+bhāve agamissa gamissa agamissā gamissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:148_0: 8. Hetuphalesve+yya eyyuṁ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṁ etho eyyāvho eyyaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:149_0: Hetubhūtāyaṁ phalabhūtāyañca kriyāyaṁ vattamānato kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā.
anya-e0807n5:153_4: ‘‘Eyyāthā’’ dinā assa okāre tumhe bhaveyyātho bhaveyyātha katha+mahaṁ devo bhaveyyāmi.
anya-e0807n5:155_0: Eyyāmassa emu vā hoti u ca.
anya-e0807n5:155_1: Kinnu kho mayaṁ bhavemu bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0807n5:156_0: Vidhimhi-so odanaṁ pace paceyya iccādi. Kamme-pacīye pacīyeyya pacce pacceyya iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:158_0: Pāto paceyya ce bhuñje, icce+ttha pacanakriyā;
anya-e0807n5:161_0: Sattiyaṁ arahate ca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:163_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayo honti vibhāsā.
anya-e0807n5:163_1: Api bhavaṁ gilitaṁ pāsāṇaṁ paceyya udaragginā,
anya-e0807n5:167_0: Patthanā, bhattiyā vā+tha, na vā byāpāraṇā vidhi.
anya-e0807n5:169_0: 10. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṁ antaṁ ssu vho e āmase
anya-e0807n5:170_0: Pañhapatthanāvidhisve+te honti kriyatthato. Āsiṁsanatthe-so sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
anya-e0807n5:172_0: Ato parassa hissa vā lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n5:174_0: Vidhimhi-lassa lope lutte vuddhi, idha pabbato hotu.
anya-e0807n5:176_0: Ajjhesane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ, ettha curādittā purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:177_0: Anumatiyaṁ-puccha vāsava maṁ pañhaṁ, pavisatu bhavaṁ. Ettha pucchato hissa lopo. Evaṁ nisīda.
anya-e0807n5:178_3: dāto lassa ekāre ca ekaṁ me nayanaṁ dehi.
anya-e0807n5:179_0: Pattakāle-sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṁ karotu bhavaṁ. Ettha ‘‘tanāditvo’’ti o.
anya-e0807n5:185_0: Labhasmā iṁ īnaṁ thaṁ+thā vā honti.
anya-e0807n5:185_1: So alabhittha labhittha alabhi labhi iṁ paccaye alatthaṁ alabhiṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:187_3: Kriyātipattiyaṁ ssābhāgassa cchaṅādese alacchā alabhissa iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:188_6: kamme-bahulādhikārā tyādīsu parabhūtesupi yathāgamaṁ vacādīnañcassa ‘‘vacādīnaṁ vassuṭa vā’’ti kamme uṭa ca ‘‘assū’’ti assa u ca,
anya-e0807n5:190_0: Bhujādīnaṁ kkhaṅa hoti ssena saha. Vakkhati vacissati, vakkhanti vacissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:192_1: Makārānubandhattā ‘‘mānubandho sarāna+mantā paro’’ti paribhāsato sarā paro. Avoci, avocuṁ,
anya-e0807n5:194_0: Kusa=akkose, āpubbo, tassa rasso ca, akkosati iccādi ñeyyaṁ, lavikaraṇalopavuddhiyo.
anya-e0807n5:196_0: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:200_0: Jara marānaṁ īyaṅa vā hoti māna+nta+tyādīsu. Jīyati.
anya-e0807n5:202_0: 5,124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhāti
anya-e0807n5:205_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopo vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:209_0: Yajassa yassa ṭi+yī honti kānubandheti bahulādhikārā tyādivisayepi kye pubbarūpe ca ijjati yijjati mayā buddho.
anya-e0807n5:210_15: Vajjetu vadetu vadatu iccādi yathāgamaṁ ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:211_1: ‘‘parokkhāyañcā’’ti caggahaṇena kama kama iti dvitte anādibyañjanalope lavikaraṇe ‘‘kavaggahā’’ dinā
anya-e0807n5:211_2: kassa ce niggahītāgame ca kate caṁkamati kamati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:212_2: tassa lope ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye’’ti okāro. So hoti, te honti. Hosi, hotha. Homi,
anya-e0807n5:214_0: Hūssa heādayo honti ssaccādo. Hessati hehi ssati hohissati.
anya-e0807n5:216_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa vā lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n5:218_0: Hūto parassa u+miccassa resuṁ vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:220_3: Parassaralope rasse ca ahuṁ, ahosimha, ahumha, rasso.
anya-e0807n5:220_7: Anajjatane āūādipaccaye kate ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+miya ṅuvaṅa sare’’ti uvaṅādese ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvo,
anya-e0807n5:221_5: kye ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti issa dīghe ca kate tena atisīyati,
anya-e0807n5:225_0: Ṭhāpānaṁ tiṭṭhapivāhonti vā nta+māna+tyādīsu. Lassa lope tiṭṭhati, tiṭṭhanti, ṭhāti, ṭhānti.
anya-e0807n5:227_0: Pādito parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho hoti vā.
anya-e0807n5:229_0: Ñādito+ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye.
anya-e0807n5:235_0: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu. Ṭo sabbādesattho. Tvaṁ asi. Pararūpādimhi kate idāni tumhe attha.
anya-e0807n5:237_0: Asasmā paresaṁ mimānaṁ mhimhā vā honti taṁsanniyogena asassa aṭa ca. Amhi.
anya-e0807n5:239_0: Esu mimesu asassa so hoti, pararūpabādhanatthaṁ. Asmi, amha asma. Bhavissatipaccaye –
anya-e0807n5:241_0: Parokkhā a-ādo anajjatana ā-ādo kriyātipattissā-ādo bhavissatissatyādo ca atthissa bhu hoti.
anya-e0807n5:243_0: Asa=bhuvi+ccasmā paresaṁ eyyādicchannaṁ sādayo honti yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:246_0: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti. Vuddhiavādese lassa lope bravīti.
anya-e0807n5:248_0: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūti. Uvaṅādese brūvanti.
anya-e0807n5:250_2: Atoyeva āhā paresaṁ tiantīnaṁ ṭaṭūvidhānañāpakā tiantīsu brūssa āho. Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi,
anya-e0807n5:256_6: aññatra ‘‘yavā sare’’ti vakāro, juhvati. Juhonti. Juhvanti.
anya-e0807n5:256_9: ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti dīghe hūyati tena aggi iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:257_1: pure viya dvebhāvachādesalope ‘‘rasso pubbassā’’ti pubbassa āssa rasso.
anya-e0807n5:260_0: Advitte vattamānassa dāssa daṁ hoti vā mimesu.
anya-e0807n5:260_17: ‘‘Ṭā’’ti bahulādhikārā dajjādesā parassa eyyassa ṭā, dajjā,
anya-e0807n5:261_1: tyādimhi caggahaṇena dvitte pubbākārassa rassatte lalope ‘‘catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’’ti pubbadhakārassa dakāre ca kate dadhāti, dadhanti. Pipubbo,
anya-e0807n5:262_0: Bhūvādi ca juhādi ca, huvādidhātavo ci+me;
anya-e0807n5:265_0: Adhunā vikaraṇapabhedapakāsanatthaṁ rudhādīnaṁ aṭṭhagaṇānaṁ kānici rūpāni udāhariyante –
anya-e0807n5:268_0: Rudhādiko aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna+nta+tyādīsu lo hoti mañca+ntasarā paro.
anya-e0807n5:270_2: Bhavissatimhi ‘‘bhuja+muca+vaca+visānaṁ kkhaṅa’’ti dhātvantena saha ssassa kkhaṅādese vuddhi,
anya-e0807n5:271_0: Muca=mocane, muccati, muccanti iccādi. Kamme-muccati, muccanti iccādi. (Rudhādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:272_0: Diva=kīḷā vijigiṁsā vohāra juti thuti gatīsu,
anya-e0807n5:276_4: Kamme-janituṁ payojetīti ‘‘payojakabyāpāre ṇāpi ce’’ti ṇimhi ‘‘aññatrāpī’’ti vuddhipaṭisedhe kyamhi ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti dīghe ca kate tena janīyati,
anya-e0807n5:279_0: Tudādīhi kattari lavisaye ko hoti. Tudati,
anya-e0807n5:279_5: Tathā tudissati tujjissati. Atudi, atudiṁsu, atujji.
anya-e0807n5:288_0: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati,
anya-e0807n5:288_3: Kye ‘‘āsse cā’’ti ettha ‘‘āsse’’ti yogavibhāgā āssa e hoti,
anya-e0807n5:288_8: ‘‘kyassa sse’’ti kyalope rasse ca kate ñāssati, ñāssanti,
anya-e0807n5:290_0: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme,
anya-e0807n5:292_0: Ñāto parassa eyyassa iyā+ñā honti vā. Jāniyā.
anya-e0807n5:294_0: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṁ vā hoti. Jaññā, jāneyya, jāneyyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:295_1: ‘‘ā ī ssādīnaṁ byañjanassiña’’ iti iñaiti yogavibhāgā iñāgame pubbasaralopo, mināti, minanti.
anya-e0807n5:302_0: Saka+āpānaṁ kuka+kuiccete āgamā honti ṇe. Sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Sakkunāti, sakkunanti.
anya-e0807n5:304_0: Sakasmā kṇāssa kkho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissati, sakkhissanti.
anya-e0807n5:306_0: Sakasmā kṇāssa kho vā hoti īādīsu.
anya-e0807n5:312_0: Tesu īādīsu suto paresaṁ kṇo+kṇānaṁ roṭa vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:312_3: Ussa lope dvittaṁ īssa si ca. Assosi,
anya-e0807n5:312_11: Tena sūye sūyeyya. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Sūyatu,
anya-e0807n5:316_0: Tanādito kattari lavisaye o hoti. Kittiṁ tanoti, tanonti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:318_0: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakkavisaye. Tanute, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanvamhe. Kamme –
anya-e0807n5:320_0: Tanassa vā ā hoti kye. Papubbo, patāyati.
anya-e0807n5:323_0: Karassa sa okārassa kubbādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Kubbati, kubbanti. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha.
anya-e0807n5:325_0: Karassa sa okārassa kuṁ vā hoti mimesu.
anya-e0807n5:325_9: ‘‘Tavaggavaraṇā’’ dinā ye rassa yakāre kayyati, kayyanti.
anya-e0807n5:325_10: Bahulādhakārā kamme kvaci iminā kayirādese tena kayirati,
anya-e0807n5:327_0: Karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Kāhati,
anya-e0807n5:329_0: Karassa sa okārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu.
anya-e0807n5:331_0: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi.
anya-e0807n5:333_0: Kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti. So kayirā.
anya-e0807n5:335_0: Kayirā parassa eyyumādīnaṁ eyyassa lopo hoti. Kayiruṁ. Tvaṁ kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e0807n5:337_0: Kayirā parasse+thassa ā hotītiādissa essa ā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:339_0: Pādito parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti.
anya-e0807n5:342_0: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti.
anya-e0807n5:344_0: Bhūvādi ca rudhādi ca, divādi ca tudādayo;
anya-e0807n5:345_0: Jyādī kiyādī svādī ca, tanādī ca curādayo.
anya-e0807n5:348_1: vīmaṁsāyaṁ mānā ca kha+sapaccayā honti yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:348_6: ‘‘Catutthadutiyā’’ dinā paṭhamakkharakakāre ca ‘‘khachasāna+mekassaro+di dve’’ti tikkha tikkha iti dvibhāve
anya-e0807n5:348_7: ‘‘lopo+nādibyañjanassā’’tiādito+ññassa byañjanassa lope ca kate titikkhādhātuto tyādipaccaya+lavikaraṇāni.
anya-e0807n5:349_1: dvittādimhi kate ‘‘mānassa vī parassa ca maṁ’’ti pubbamānassa vī ca paramānassa mañca hoti.
anya-e0807n5:351_0: Tikicchāyaṁ saṁsaye ca vattamānā kitā cho hoti.
anya-e0807n5:351_2: chapaccaye pubbeva pararūpādimhi ca kate ‘‘kitassā+saṁsaye vā’’ti dvitte pubbassa tiādese tikicchadhātuto tyādayo.
anya-e0807n5:351_5: Vipubbato kitā chappaccayādimhi kate ‘‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’’ti dvitte pubbassa kassa co.
anya-e0807n5:353_0: Nindāyaṁ gupa+badhehi cho hoti bassa bho ca.
anya-e0807n5:353_1: Gupa=rakkhane+tīmasmā chappaccaye ‘‘aññatrāpī’’ti ottābhāve ca pararūpādimhi ‘‘kavaggahā’’ dinā gassa
anya-e0807n5:353_2: je ca kate ‘‘gupissussā’’ti dvitte pubbassa ussa i hoti.
anya-e0807n5:353_4: Nindāyaṁ-badha=bandhane+tīmasmā chappaccaye ca imināva bassa bhakāre ca pararūpe paṭhamakkhare bhacchabhacchaiti
anya-e0807n5:353_5: dvitte anādibyañjanassa lope ‘‘catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’’ti dvitte pubbassa bhassa bakāre ‘‘khachasesvassī’’ti
anya-e0807n5:353_6: ikāre dīghe ca kate bībhacchadhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:355_0: Tumantato icchāya+matthe te kha+sa+chā honti bahulaṁ,
anya-e0807n5:355_3: Bhojanāyāti viggayha ‘‘tuṁ+tāye’’ccādinā tuṁpaccaye ‘‘lahussupantassā’’ti okāre pararūpe ca kate bhottu+micchatīti
anya-e0807n5:355_4: viggayha iminā khapaccaye tuṁpaccayassa iminā ca lope ‘‘nimittābhāve nemittikassāpi ca abhāvo’’ti ñāyā
anya-e0807n5:355_5: pararūpaokārānaṁ abhāve khassa pararūpa+khakārādimhi ca kate bhukkha bhukkha iti dvitte tatiyabakāro hoti,
anya-e0807n5:356_1: jayanāya iti viggayha pure viya tumādimhi kate jetu+micchatīti viggayha sappaccaye jisa jisa iti dvitte
anya-e0807n5:356_2: anādibyañjanalope dvitte parassa jissa ‘‘jiharānaṁ giṁ’’ti giṁ.
anya-e0807n5:357_1: ghasitu+micchati chappaccayādimhi pure viya kate ghassa ‘‘kavaggahā’’dinā jhe jhassa ‘‘catutthadutiyā’’
anya-e0807n5:357_2: dinā jakāre ‘‘khachasesvassī’’ti ikāre ca kate jighacchadhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:361_0: Kammato upamānā ācāratthe īyo hoti. Putta+mivā+carati puttīyati sissaṁ, puttīyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:363_0: Īyo hoti. Kuṭiya+mivā+carati kuṭīyati pāsāde. Pāsādevā+carati pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṁ, pāsādīyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:367_1: Bhusoti paṭhamantato abhuso bhuso bhavatīti bhusāyati,
anya-e0807n5:367_3: ‘‘Vicchābhikkhaññesu dve’’ti ābhikkhaññatthe dvitte apaṭapaṭā paṭapaṭā bhavatīti āye paṭapaṭāyati,
anya-e0807n5:369_0: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṁ atthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0807n5:371_0: Namoiccasmā karotīti asmiṁ atthe asso hoti.
anya-e0807n5:371_1: Namo karotīti asmiṁ atthe assapaccaye tyādayo honti,
anya-e0807n5:373_1: Hatthinā atikkamatīti ipaccaye lavikaraṇa+ekāra+ayādesesu katesu atihatthayati.
anya-e0807n5:377_0: Kattāraṁ yo payojeti, tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi+ṇāpī honti bahulaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:379_0: Dve dve+ko hoti vā sese, bahulaṁtyanuvuttiyā.
anya-e0807n5:382_0: Tasmā kattari kamme ca, ṇi+ṇāpīnaṁ tu sambhavo;
anya-e0807n5:383_0: Na bhāve suddhakattā tu, kammaṁ hoti payojake.
anya-e0807n5:386_3: Tyādimhi ‘‘ṇi+ṇāpyā+pīhi vā’’ti lavikaraṇe ekāre ‘‘eona+mayavā sare’’ti ayādeso.
anya-e0807n5:387_1: So devadattena odanaṁ pācayati pāceti iccādi,
anya-e0807n5:387_3: Kamme-so tena devadattena odano pācīyati pācāpīyati+ccādi,
anya-e0807n5:388_0: Gantuṁ payojetīti atthe so taṁ purisaṁ gāmaṁ gamayati gameti gacchāpayati gacchāpeti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:389_0: Guha=saṁvaraṇe, guhituṁ payojetīti ṇimhi ‘‘guhissa sare’’ti dīgho. Gūhayati, gūhayanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:390_0: Disa+dusa=appītiyaṁ, dusituṁ payojetīti ṇimhi ‘‘ṇimhi dīgho dusassā’’ti dīghe dūsayati+ccādi.
